---
id: auth-login-login-post
title: "Login user"
description: "To authenticate a user, you need to provide the user's email (username is optional) and password. After that, the user will be authenticated and a token will be returned. If the user has 2FA enabled, the user will be prompted to enter the 2FA code."

hide_title: true

---

import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Login user"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/login"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



To authenticate a user, you need to provide the user's email (username is optional) and password. After that, the user will be authenticated and a token will be returned. If the user has 2FA enabled, the user will be prompted to enter the 2FA code.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"email":{"type":"string","format":"email","title":"Email"},"password":{"type":"string","title":"Password"},"username":{"anyOf":[{"type":"string"},{"type":"null"}],"title":"Username"}},"type":"object","required":["email","password"],"title":"UserLoginRequest"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successful Response","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"anyOf":[{"properties":{"access_token":{"type":"string","title":"Access Token"},"token_type":{"type":"string","title":"Token Type"}},"type":"object","required":["access_token","token_type"],"title":"UserBearerToken"},{"properties":{"otp_data":{"properties":{"secret":{"type":"string","title":"Secret"},"otp_path":{"type":"string","title":"Otp Path"}},"type":"object","required":["secret","otp_path"],"title":"UserOtpData"},"requires_2fa":{"type":"boolean","title":"Requires 2Fa"},"message":{"type":"string","title":"Message"}},"type":"object","required":["otp_data","requires_2fa","message"],"title":"User2FARequired","description":"Response model for 2FA required login - does NOT contain actual token"}],"title":"Response Auth Login Login Post"}}}},"401":{"description":"The user was not found or the password was incorrect.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"errors":{"items":{"properties":{"title":{"type":"string","title":"Title"},"msg":{"type":"string","title":"Msg"}},"type":"object","required":["title","msg"],"title":"GenericErrorDetail","description":"Describes a single generic error."},"type":"array","title":"Errors"}},"type":"object","required":["errors"],"title":"GenericErrorResponse","description":"The complete response body for general HTTP errors (e.g., 404, 500)."}}}},"422":{"description":"The user was not have correct request.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"errors":{"items":{"properties":{"title":{"type":"string","title":"Title"},"source":{"type":"string","title":"Source"},"msg":{"type":"string","title":"Msg"}},"type":"object","required":["title","source","msg"],"title":"ValidationErrorDetail","description":"Describes a single validation error, including the source field."},"type":"array","title":"Errors"}},"type":"object","required":["errors"],"title":"ValidationErrorResponse","description":"The complete response body for a 422 Unprocessable Entity error."}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
